wanted it i did not include a template because oogie s mouth comes in so many different shapes 2 you can sew hot glue or use fabric glue to put the mouth on his face make sure the mouth is where you want it before you glue it or sew it on 3 take a long strand of black embroidery thread thread your needle insert the needle into a hole on the side of the head bring the needle up to a place on his
